    body:
        achieve facing_char(char, television)

        achieve is_on(television)

        bind television: item where:

behavior turn_on_tv(remote:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote) # Hold the remote control once
        achieve facing_char(char, television) # Make sure the character is facing the TV
        touch(remote) # Touch the remote to turn on the TV
